resources.string: // 把下面的绘制代码移到 super.onDraw() 的上面，就可以让原主体内容盖住你的绘制代码了 // （或者你也可以把 super.onDraw() 移到这段代码的下面） Layout layout = getLayout(); bounds.left = layout.getLineLeft(1); bounds.right = layout.getLineRight(1); bounds.top = layout.getLineTop(1); bounds.bottom = layout.getLineBottom(1); canvas.drawRect(bounds, paint); bounds.left = layout.getLineLeft(layout.getLineCount() - 3); bounds.right = layout.getLineRight(layout.getLineCount() - 3); bounds.top = layout.getLineTop(layout.getLineCount() - 3); bounds.bottom = layout.getLineBottom(layout.getLineCount() - 3); canvas.drawRect(bounds, paint);
